entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:09 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:09 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
